content: are starting a new round knit 15 total rounds of ribbing knit 10 rounds of knit st heel knit across the first half of your sts of the round now we will begin the shadow wrap heel see tutorial leg see notes to determine how long to knit knit all sts around until you have reached your length needed @alwaysyarnfirst 2024 pg3 toe decrease round k1 ssk k to last 3 sts on needle k2tog k1 repeat on 2nd needle work 1 decrease round work 3 knit rounds knit all stitches work 1 decrease round work 2 knit rounds knit all stitches work 1 decrease round work 1 knit round knit all stitches work decrease rounds until you have 10 sts left on each needle kitchener stitch cut yarn leaving a tail 4 times longer of yarn than the top of toe thread yarn onto tapestry needle as we look at the sock we are working with the fn the front needle where we are looking at the rs and the bn the back needle which we are looking at the ws - or the inside of our sock see tutorial if needed ● go through first st on fn as if to knit slipping the st off the needle ● go through next st on fn as if to purl keeping the st on the needle ● go through first st on bn as if to purl slipping the st off the needle ● go through next st on bn as if to knit keeping the st on the needle continue these 4 steps until there is only 1 st on each needle ● go through last st on fn as if to knit slipping the st off the needle ● go through last st on bn as if to purl slipping the st off the needle weave in your ends & cast on your second sock @alwaysyarnfirst 2024 pg4
